endorsements.name: John Doe
endorsements.quote: Mintz is the leader we need for our community. Their dedication and vision are truly inspiring.

donatePage.mailDonationText: If you prefer to donate by mail, please send a check payable to "Mintz Campaign" to: 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA 12345

privacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.content: No mobile information will be shared by us with third parties/affiliates for marketing/promotional purposes. Text messaging originator opt-in data and consent will not be shared with any third parties unless required by law. Carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages.

signupForm.title: Join the Movement!
